workgroup_id.name: workgroup_id
workgroup_id.description: The ID of the workgroup for which the circuit limit check is requested for..
workgroup_id.validation_error_text: Parameter workgroup_id only accepts integer numbers.

endpoint_num.name: endpoint_num
endpoint_num.description: The number for which the endpoints allowed on the circuit is checked for.
endpoint_num.validation_error_text: Parameter endpoint_num only accepts integer numbers.

name: is_within_circuit_endpoint_limit
description: Checks that number of circuits in a workgroup on an endpoint are within the specified limit
